Pre-Game Insights: The series is tied 1-1 between the San Diego Padres and the Los Angeles Dodgers in the NLDS.
Others: The game is scheduled for Tuesday, 9:08 p.m. EDT. Michael King will start for the Padres with a 13-9 record and 2.95 ERA, while Walker Buehler will start for the Dodgers with a 1-6 record and 5.38 ERA.
